expo.name: TravelLens
expo.description: AI-powered Korean souvenir recognition app for tourists. Take a photo and instantly identify Korean souvenirs with multilingual information.

infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: We need access to your camera to take photos of Korean souvenirs.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: We need access to your photo library to select souvenir images.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: We use your location to show nearby souvenir shops on the map.
